column4: the 8.04 uses an older kernel which probably does have the driver for you wifi card you can compile a newer kernel or search google for the specific driver source code project and compile that
out of curiosity could you pm me the other problems you had with 8.10 im still using 8.04 and am planning to upgrade one day
The major problem I ran into was that my graphics driver wouldn't work properly.  I tried all the suggested drivers and each time it killed the gui
